name: Indefinite Epicus
description:
Indefinite Epicus is a turn-based RPG with roguelite elements, made within 12 hours using RPG Maker MV. 

Embark on a journey to defeat the Daemon Lord and bring peace to the continent! Your heroes can die in battle, and when they die, a new hero will emerge to continue the previous hero's quest.

Controls (Keyboard/PC Browsers):
Arrow Keys, Left Click - Move
Z, Enter, Left Click - Confirm, Interact
X, Esc, Right Click - Cancel, Open Menu

Controls (Mobile Browsers):
1 Finger Tap - Move, Interact
2 Fingers Tap - Cancel

Credits
Game by Xurzerth
Art Assets: Kenney
Plugins Used: Yanfly Engine Plugins, SumRndmDude (http://sumrndm.site/), Squirting Elephant, Shaz, Krimer
Audio: Kadokawa, Wingless Seraph 

*Saving is currently not possible. Saving and loading game data will be added to the downloadable version later.
